name: Space Odyssey (itch) (CandyDandyMan)
description:
Space Odyssey

Made for the Kindred Game Jam! A small arcade style dodging game set in space.

Dodge the incoming asteroids and use boxes to clear a path!

CONTROLS (Mouse Recommended)

WASD/ Arrow Keys to move

Drag boxes with the mouse

Boxes will destroy asteroids

Post your high-score in the comments section below! (Mine is 22)

I had a BLAST (I'm sorry) making this game! I hope you have as much fun playing it as it was to make it

Sorry that there is no WebGL build, Unity was not playing nice :(
